test_patterns.root_cause_pattern: Test assertion failure - test logic or implementation issue
prevention_steps: Analyze assertion failure details from stack trace
Check if test data or fixtures are correct
Review test logic and expected vs actual values
detection_criteria: Monitor for test_assertion_failure in test execution

test_patterns.root_cause_pattern: Test import error - missing or broken test dependencies
prevention_steps: Analyze broken_dependencies systematically
Check if modules are installed: pip list | grep <module>
Validate fix addresses root cause
Identify missing modules from error message
Install missing dependencies: pip install <module>
Implement root cause fix
detection_criteria: Monitor for test_import_error in test execution

prevention_steps: Verify user has necessary access rights
Apply correct permissions using chmod
Identify files with incorrect permissions
detection_criteria: Monitor for permission_denied in test execution
